headline: BP Appoints Former Devon Energy Chief David Hager as Nonexecutive Director
summary: The naming of the U.S. oil executive comes at a time when BP is seeking to more than double its production of oil and gas in the country by the end of the decade.

raw.headline: BP Appoints Former Devon Energy Chief David Hager as Nonexecutive Director

headline: BP names US oil and gas veteran Dave Hager as non-executive director
summary: BP on Friday said it has appointed U.S. oil and gas industry veteran David Hager as a non-executive director effective June 2. Hager held various roles at U.S.-based Devon Energy,...
